timeline.bodyText: ❔ Are we setting the value of BRANCH_NAME on the job configuration?
timeline.author: shaundmorris

replies.bodyText: It's a preset global variable as part of the Multi branch pipeline build.
replies.author: AdamBurstynski

timeline.bodyText: ❔ How does this related to maven repository caching? Or are you improving releases in this PR as well?
timeline.author: shaundmorris

replies.bodyText: Looks like the PR also updates the Maven version used in the builds. I imagine this is part of that change.
replies.author: AdamBurstynski

replies.bodyText: That makes sense so this will version of the release plugin works better with the latest version of Maven, gotcha 👍
replies.author: shaundmorris
